description:
Takato Ryuji is an open otaku first-year university student with an average appearance and academic record.

His childhood friend Asakura Miyu, also his next-door neighbor, is an excellent, outstanding athlete, beautiful, and hardworking student.

Due to a traumatic experience, she has a strong negative feeling towards boys who approach her, and she hates herself for it.

The two of them decided to join “Byte”, a club that edits the department’s PR magazine.

In order to overcome their trauma and to enjoy their university life.

The distance between Miyu and Ryuji changes little by little. Miyu’s past trauma becomes clearer.

At some point, they overcame their past traumas and started dating as lovers.

A heartwarming love comedy that is as sweet as sugar, but with a refreshing aftertaste.

Please be covered by their lovey-dovey relationship as the seasons' transition.>
